sources.title: Ready 2 Die | Full Movie | Action Crime | War In LA!
sources.description:
Ready 2 Die - After a violent bank robbery, the trio of hoods make their way across East L.A. carrying a blood-soaked bag of money. When word gets out, they must fend off gangs and crooked cops alike as they strive to keep the loot and stay alive.
2014.  Stars: Pablo Santiago, Jacob Martinez, John Azpilicueta
